title: Sidewall, 1860–80
creditline: Gift of Antiquarian and Landmarks Society, Inc.
description: Vining floral design.  Clusters of foliage, printed in 8 colors: shades of taupe with light gray shadow effect, with blue flowers. Vining tendrils printed in metallic gold. Printed on a white satin ground.  This piece was cut from the roll end with a section of unprinted white satin ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1860–80.
1860–80. Block-printed. Gift of Antiquarian and Landmarks Society, Inc.. 1971-82-14.
